articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
The shuttering of Rogue Ales & Spirits has a distinct and severe impact on the local tourism economy of Newport, Oregon, moving beyond just job losses to affect the city’s identity as a destination. 1. Loss of a Major Anchor Attraction Rogue Ales’ flagship brewery and public house on the Newport Bayfront was far more…
The post The Economic Ripple: Tourism Impact of Rogue Ales’ Closure on Newport, Oregon appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: The Economic Ripple: Tourism Impact of Rogue Ales’ Closure on Newport, Oregon

articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
11/14/2025 NEWPORT, OR – The abrupt closure of Rogue Ales & Spirits, a 37-year veteran and nationally recognized brand, serves as a sharp indicator of the financial rationalization currently sweeping the U.S. craft beer sector. The sudden shutdown of the company’s main Newport brewery and all associated public houses highlights the vulnerability of regional brewers…
The post Case Study: Rogue Ales Closure Signals Crisis in Mid-Tier Craft Brewing appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: Case Study: Rogue Ales Closure Signals Crisis in Mid-Tier Craft Brewing

articles.author: Jim Teece
articles.description:
Nov 14, 2025 NEWPORT, OR — In a stunning and sudden move that sent shockwaves through the craft beer community, Rogue Ales & Spirits has ceased all operations, effective immediately. The closure, which included the iconic main brewery and public house in Newport, as well as all other pubs across Oregon, reportedly happened without any…
The post End of an Era: Rogue Ales Abruptly Closes All Operations, Citing Financial Crisis appeared first on Southern Oregon Business Journal.
articles.title: End of an Era: Rogue Ales Abruptly Closes All Operations, Citing Financial Crisis
